name: ladder
description: It's a small aluminum ladder. Useful for reaching high places.
secondaryDescription: You drop the ladder underneath the attic hatch. You open the hatch and climb up.

verbInteractions.Open: You pull the ladder open. It's much harder to carry that way...
verbInteractions.Listen: You put your ear up against the ladder.......... Nothing happens.
verbInteractions.Use: You prop up the ladder underneath the attic hatch.
verbInteractions.Eat: Unless you've had some serious dental work done I don't think that's a good idea.
verbInteractions.Examine: It's a small aluminum ladder. Useful for reaching high places.
verbInteractions.Take: You lift the ladder onto your shoulder.
verbInteractions.Peel: You pull the ladder open. It's much harder to carry that way...
verbInteractions.Drop: You set the ladder down and stretch your shoulders.
verbInteractions.Shake: It rattles loudly, but nothing happens.
